DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine information provide physician fetal pulse oximeter labor reduce chance cesarean delivery .
DOC.detailed_description: Information fetal well-being labor great importance manage physician . The current use fetal heart rate monitor provide information fetal condition , primary tool use determine immediate operative delivery require . The fetal pulse oximeter provide additional information regard fetal oxygen saturation . Intervention : A fetal oxygen saturation sensor place uterus , fetal cheek forehead uterine wall . In half patient , manage physician access fetal oxygen saturation fetal heart rate monitoring . In half patient , labor monitor fetal heart rate alone . Study hypothesis : The additional information provide use fetal pulse oximeter reduce chance cesarean delivery . The primary outcome cesarean section indication secondary outcome cesarean delivery non-reassuring fetal heart rate dystocia , neonatal morbidity .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Nulliparous Singleton , cephalic pregnancy Gestational age least 36 week , 0 day Cervical dilatation > = 2 cm Station 2 ( 5ths scale ) Ruptured membranes Internal monitoring device place Exclusion criterion : Need immediate delivery Planned cesarean delivery Cervical dilatation > 6 cm Known fetal anomaly demise Multifetal gestation Maternal fever Placenta previa Previous uterine surgery Active HSV infection Known HIV hepatitis infection Diabetes require insulin Heart disease require medication Known chronic renal disease Enrollment another labor study
